attributes.action: legalise hemp oil for cancer sufferers.
attributes.additional_details: There is plenty of evidence now that Hemp oil cures aggressive malignant tumours in many cases. This is being ignored for two reasons. Companies that make cancer drugs make £billions selling drugs that have massive side effects as well as financial effects on families all over the country. Hemp as a plant cannot be patented by said companies. As companies make £billions selling these drugs they have a vested interest in keeping hemp illegal. THERE IS TONNES OF EVIDENCE showing the benefits. We need a proper and fit discussion regarding this. Please sign this petition.
